Texts.Eng: First, you must carve the flesh from the bones of the sacrifice; be careful, for any tearing of the skin will result in severe repercussions.

Next, place the artifact in the center and begin the chant and the dance. His power guides you, should you be true to the call. Should the sacrifice struggle, end that struggle for the time has come. You shall be cleansed.
Now, you must stitch the flesh into your own, starting at the toes and working up. Only once the full suit is complete may you begin the Black Chant.
This falls into the 'nope' category of biographies
